subdisciplines.name: Camera operating
subdisciplines.description: The practice of operating a film or video camera on a film set.

subdisciplines.name: Lighting
subdisciplines.description: The placement and use of lights on a film or video production to achieve a desired effect.

subdisciplines.name: Color Grading
subdisciplines.description: The process of adjusting the colors and tones of a film or video production to achieve a desired look or mood.
